title: About Me
text: Hello, My name is Joseph Silveira. I was born and raised in the Central Valley. I grew up playing soccer, baseball and football. I grew up on my dads farm in Atwater before moving to Riverbank in 2018. I graduated highschool in 2020, and went straight into CSUCI the following Fall for Mechatronic Engineering. I am very excited about my degree and hope to get a masters degree in engineering design. My dream job is making aftermarket parts for automobiles.

title: Resume
text: Hello, my name is Joseph Silveira. This is my resume \ * Education - CSUCI Junior Mechatronics Major(2020-2024) - Central Catholic High School(2016-2020) * Internships/Jobs - Channel Islands Boating Center as a Sailing Instructor(2021-) - burger king as a cook(2021) - wellspring Charitable gardens as a farm hand(2020-2021) - Intern for FarmWise Robotics(2018)

title: My Website
text: This is about me. My name is Joseph Silveira. I am a Mechatronic engineering Major. I wanted to get into Mechatronics because I was exposed to a robotic start up when I was a sophmore in high school. I like mechatronics becasue it gives me the opportunity to learn hands on and do more labs than homework. I also have several hobbies. I am on the CSUCI sailing team and I like to skate, but iâ€™m not very good at it.
